page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT IN FILKINS
page.content: Over 18 years, living in 'block'- 255 Employed full-time: 80 Employed part-time: 39 Self employed full-time: 30 Self employed part-time: 9 In furhter education: 3 Seeking work: 4 Adult Trg Scheme: 3 NOT seekiong work, inc.elderly/sick: 87 LOCATION OF WORK FOR FULL-TIME WORKERS: In village: 42 Within 5 miles: 25 Within 15 miles: 10 Within 25 miles: 16 Over 50 miles: 7 Others: varies WORK DONE IN VILLAGE-not necessarily by residents. Professional:14 Clerical: 2 Building/stone crafts: 14 Shop/Pub: 11 Other crafts: 6 Manufacturing: 16 Agency selling: 4 Agriculture/land: 13 (Agricultural employment has declined.) New Craft/Industry Centre - 13 places: New Animal Feed Mill, though with environmental problems: 15 places.
